body: A vertical supply curve indicates that

options.a: the same fixed quantity will be supplied no matter the price
options.b: the quantity supplied is responsive to price
options.c: an increase in price will result in an increase in the quantity supplied
options.d: there is a fixed price for the commodity below which no supply will be made

body: A change in supply is best described as a

options.b: shift of the supply curve to the right
options.c: shift of the supply curve to the left
options.d: shift of the supply curve to the left or to the right

explanation: Change in supply is the increase or decrease in supply of gods and services due to changes in the other factors affecting supply other than the price (e.g. cost of production, weather, etc.)
